description:
average value of the instantaneous availability over a given time interval (t1, t2).
Note 1 The mean availability is related to the instantaneous availability A(t) as:

A¯¯¯(t1, t2)=1t2−t1∫ t2 t1A(t) dt

Note 2 Terms 'mean' or 'average' are used as synonyms  to the arithmetic mean.
